sentences: NPR Music described his style as "soul-stirring melodies from way up north" in discussing his 2014 single, "Color Decay."
Meyvant performs internationally, playing his first New York City show in 2017.
He also performed at Bumbershoot 2017, a Seattle music festival.
At the 2015 Icelandic Music Awards, Meyvant won Newcomer of the Year and Best Single of the Year for "Color Decay".
He won Best Pop Album of the Year in the 2017 Icelandic Music Awards for Floating Harmonies.
